name: Project Music V2
description:
https://www.fiverr.com/ouco_games/create-a-rhythm-music-game-for-you

Demo for my Fiverr gig - Click here for gig.

If you want your own custom music game for Mac/PC or Web (Mobile coming soon) then please check out the link and send me a message on Fiverr.

Discord

Information
On the first screen press the keys you would like for your lanes. When this is complete press R to redo the input or S to start the game.

Next you have the song select screen. Press Q and E to change the note speed before the song or LEFT and RIGHT to change the difficulty.

Enter to start.

During game play you can press ESC to pause the game. Here, you can change the note speed live as well as access other menus.

DURING game play if you press UP and DOWN it will alter the note delay - useful for if you are using Bluetooth headphones or have an issues. When you have found your correct delay press ESC and restart the song.

When the song is complete you will get a stats screen. Here you can choose to replay or go back to song select with the arrow keys and enter.

Thank you for looking!
